title: Segment 1 (00:00-00:30)
snippet: I'm talking about... Hope. Hope. We'll take some of our friends. Hope is a dangerous thing. Hope and grab a man insane. He's got no use on you, sir. But he didn't use to deny it, yeah. Remember Red? Hope is a good thing. Maybe the best of things.

title: Segment 2 (00:15-00:41)
snippet: Hope and grab a man insane. He's got no use on you, sir. But he didn't use to deny it, yeah. Remember Red? Hope is a good thing. Maybe the best of things. And no good thing ever does. I will be hoping that this letter finds you. It finds you well. Your friend. Andy.
